verbs.description: [ARG0: state employee] [V: collected] [ARG1: thousands] [ARGM-PRP: for improper expenses] an unidentified state employee collected 93 338 in improper travel reimbursements because his place of employment was incorrectly listed according to audits from the state comptroller office for nearly four and a half years an employee with the state department of health spent a majority of their time working from an office other than the designated place of employment which allowed them to be reimbursed for travel expenses state employees are not reimbursed for travel between their official station and their residence as it considered part of their commute albany doh commissioner howard zucker united states department of health and human services
